markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Snare](/Traits.aspx?ID=146)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 636 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Traps typically made by rangers, snares follow special rules that allow them to be constructed quickly and used on the battlefield.
name: Snare
